text: Formula Rossa is a steel roller coaster located at Ferrari World in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates. The coaster was built by Swiss manufacturer Intamin and opened to the public on November 4, 2010. Utilizing a hydraulic launch system, riders accelerate from 0-149 mph in approximately two seconds. Riders are required by the park to wear safety goggles when riding. Category:Roller coasters Category:Abu Dhabi (emirate)
title: Formula Rossa
